message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!

I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much ground. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm still willing to give you a better deal, but I'm not going to give up too much more. Let's see if we can find a middle ground
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share. Take it or leave it!

I'm getting closer to my minimum, but I'm not giving up yet. Meet me in the middle or walk away!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still willing to give you a decent share. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share. This is my final offer!
I'm running out of options, but I'm still willing to give you a decent share. This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not budging, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I've had enough, I'm taking a 50/50 split. It's the best I can do, and it's better than getting nothing. Let's end this game.
